name: nuAlerts
tag_list: www-nualerts-com, community-news, community, hyperlocal, local-news, mayors, social-media-marketing-tool, social-news
overview:
nuAlerts powers business communities with a powerful online network that includes automated Member Newsletters, Community Directory, Community Calendar, Widgets, SMS Marketing, Email marketing, Posting of Member Deals, Promotions, Jobs and more. Over 80,000 members, 60+ communities and 34 Chambers of Commerce call nuAlerts their marketing home base for online networking.

Any website looking to add an online business community functionality can incorporate nuAlerts. For example, business parks, cities, banks, networking groups can launch an online community on nuAlerts and plug it into their website to give their members a voice. For more information including features and pricing please view www.nualerts.com.
